name: email.failed.login.block
subject: Account blocked on %domain.name% due to excessive failed logins
body:
Hi %user.firstName% %user.lastName%,

We have detected excessive failed logins on your account and have disabled it. Please reset your password to unblock it.

placeholders.name: %email.validate.url%
placeholders.description: A link which the player clicks on to validate his/her email address
